text: Sadness is a cancelled video game that was going to be released on the Nintendo Wii. It was being made by Nibris, which is a company in Poland. It was going to be created for the Wii. The story of the game would have taken place in Ukraine, during the time before World War I. The main character would have been Maria Lengyel, a woman who has to protect her son Alexander from monsters. ==References== Category:Cancelled video games Category:Monochrome video games Category:Psychological horror games Category:Single-player video games Category:Wii games
